info.title: FinancePro API
info.description:
**FinancePro** is a comprehensive personal finance management platform with AI-powered features for transaction classification, budget forecasting, and intelligent financial insights.

## Features
- Multi-account management
- Transaction tracking with AI classification
- Budget planning and monitoring
- AI-powered financial insights
- Advanced analytics and reporting

## Authentication
All endpoints (except `/auth/*`) require Bearer JWT token authentication.

get.description: Health check endpoint
Version information

post.description: Registra nuovo utente e crea profilo finanziario di default

AccountBalance.title: AccountBalance
AccountBalance.description:
Schema for account balance endpoint response.
Returns current balance with metadata.

account_type.description: Type of account (checking, savings, credit_card, etc.)

financial_profile_id.title: Financial Profile Id
financial_profile_id.description: ID of the financial profile this account belongs to (optional, defaults to user's default profile)

account_number.title: Account Number
account_number.description: Account number (will be encrypted in production)

AccountCreate.title: AccountCreate
AccountCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new account.
financial_profile_id is optional - if not provided, the user's default profile will be used.

AccountList.title: AccountList
AccountList.description: Schema for list accounts response with pagination.

account_type.description: Type of account (checking, savings, credit_card, etc.)

financial_profile_id.title: Financial Profile Id
financial_profile_id.description: ID of the financial profile this account belongs to

initial_balance.title: Initial Balance
initial_balance.description: Initial balance when account was created

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the account is currently active

AccountResponse.title: AccountResponse
AccountResponse.description:
Complete account schema returned by API endpoints.
Includes all fields including computed current_balance.

AccountUpdate.title: AccountUpdate
AccountUpdate.description:
Schema for updating an existing account.
All fields are optional (partial update).

CategoryListResponse.title: CategoryListResponse
CategoryListResponse.description: Schema for list categories response with pagination support.

color.title: Color
color.description: Hex color code for UI display

parent_category_id.title: Parent Category Id
parent_category_id.description: ID of parent category (null for root categories)

financial_profile_id.title: Financial Profile Id
financial_profile_id.description: ID of the financial profile this category belongs to

full_path.title: Full Path
full_path.description: Full hierarchical path (e.g., 'Groceries > Fresh Food > Fruits')

is_system.title: Is System
is_system.description: System categories cannot be deleted by users

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the category is currently active

CategoryResponse.title: CategoryResponse
CategoryResponse.description:
Complete category schema returned by API endpoints.
Includes all fields and optional subcategories for tree view.

ChatMessageRequest.title: ChatMessageRequest
ChatMessageRequest.description: Request to send a chat message

auto_apply.title: Auto Apply
auto_apply.description: Automatically apply classification if confidence is high

DatabaseType.title: DatabaseType
DatabaseType.description: Deprecated: Supported database types for distributed storage

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description of the financial profile

profile_type.description: Type of financial profile (personal, family, business)

database_connection_string.title: Database Connection String
database_connection_string.description: Connection string for distributed database (will be encrypted)

database_type.description: Type of database for distributed storage (PostgreSQL, MSSQL)

FinancialProfileCreate.title: FinancialProfileCreate
FinancialProfileCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new financial profile.
Optionally includes database connection settings for distributed storage.

FinancialProfileListResponse.title: FinancialProfileListResponse
FinancialProfileListResponse.description: Schema for list financial profiles response with pagination support.

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description of the financial profile

profile_type.description: Type of financial profile (personal, family, business)

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the profile is currently active

is_available.title: Is Available
is_available.description:
Check if the profile's database is currently available.
Profiles without custom database are always available.

FinancialProfileResponse.title: FinancialProfileResponse
FinancialProfileResponse.description:
Complete financial profile schema returned by API endpoints.
Includes all fields including computed is_available field.

FinancialProfileUpdate.title: FinancialProfileUpdate
FinancialProfileUpdate.description:
Schema for updating an existing financial profile.
All fields are optional (partial update).

GoalContributionCreate.title: GoalContributionCreate
GoalContributionCreate.description: Schema for creating a goal contribution

main_profile_id.title: Main Profile Id

MainProfileUpdate.description: Schema for setting user's main profile.

ScopeType.description: Scope type for budgets, goals, recommendations

SuggestedTag.description: A suggested tag for a transaction

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: ID of the account this transaction belongs to

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: ID of the category this transaction is assigned to

transaction_type.description: Type of transaction (bank_transfer, withdrawal, payment, etc.)

value_date.title: Value Date
value_date.description: Date when transaction was valued (for banking)

TransactionCreate.title: TransactionCreate
TransactionCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new transaction.
Includes optional fields for advanced features.

TransactionListResponse.title: TransactionListResponse
TransactionListResponse.description: Schema for list transactions response with pagination support.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: ID of the account this transaction belongs to

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: ID of the category this transaction is assigned to

transaction_type.description: Type of transaction (bank_transfer, withdrawal, payment, etc.)

recurring_transaction_id.title: Recurring Transaction Id
recurring_transaction_id.description: ID of parent recurring transaction (if applicable)

exchange_rate_id.title: Exchange Rate Id
exchange_rate_id.description: ID of exchange rate used for conversion

amount_in_profile_currency.title: Amount In Profile Currency
amount_in_profile_currency.description: Amount converted to profile's default currency

merchant_normalized.title: Merchant Normalized
merchant_normalized.description: ML-normalized merchant name for better categorization

TransactionResponse.title: TransactionResponse
TransactionResponse.description:
Complete transaction schema returned by API endpoints.
Includes all fields including computed and metadata fields.

TransactionUpdate.title: TransactionUpdate
TransactionUpdate.description:
Schema for updating an existing transaction.
All fields are optional (partial update).

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from /api/v1/auth/login endpoint. Token expires after 30 minutes.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Health check and status endpoints for monitoring

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: User authentication and authorization endpoints. Includes registration, login, token refresh, and password reset.

tags.name: Financial Profiles
tags.description: Financial profile management. Create and manage personal, family, or business profiles with optional high-security encryption.

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: Financial accounts management. Create and manage multiple accounts (checking, savings, credit cards, investments) with multi-currency support.

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Transaction tracking and management with AI-powered automatic categorization. Supports bulk import from CSV and manual entry.

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: Transaction categories management. Organize transactions with hierarchical categories and custom tags.

tags.name: Budgets
tags.description: Budget planning and monitoring. Create budgets with scope support (user, profile, multi-profile), track spending, and receive alerts.

tags.name: Financial Goals
tags.description: Financial goal management. Set savings goals with milestones, track contributions, and monitor achievement probability.

tags.name: Imports
tags.description: Data import functionality. Import transactions from CSV files with automatic field mapping and duplicate detection.

tags.name: Analysis
tags.description: Financial analysis and reporting. Analyze expenses and income by category, get spending trends, compare budgets vs actual, and multi-profile aggregations.

tags.name: AI Services
tags.description: AI-powered features. Transaction classification, financial forecasting, chat assistant, and spending optimization recommendations.
